frameset.note: Frames file for 'yield' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus

example.name: transitive
example.text: The top money market funds are currently yielding well over 9%.

example.name: with temporal
example.text: A single acre of grapes yielded a mere 75 cases in 1987.

example.name: Arg1 as range, non constituent
example.text: Serial bonds yield from 6.20% in 1991 to 7% in 2000.

example.name: arg1 as range, constituent
example.text: They yield from 6.2% in 1991 to 7.272% in 2001.

example.name: all args
example.text: John yielded the right-of-way to the Mack truck.

example.name: another lost thing lost
example.text: The US yielded to the temptation to avoid the danger of combat.
example.arg: to the temptation to avoid the danger of combat.

example.name: savings bond
example.text: The Canadian government announced a new, 12-year Canada Savings Bond issue that *trace* will yield investors 10.5% in the first year.
example.arg: *trace* -> that -> a new, 12-year Canada Savings Bond issue
